items.title: Fristam Twin Screw 3" triclamp Sanitary Positive Displacement Pump FDS2- 15hp
items.category: Business & Industrial:Hydraulics, Pneumatics, Pumps & Plumbing:Pumps & Pump Accessories:Centrifugal Pumps
items.description:
Fristam Twin Screw Sanitary Positive Displacement Pump


-model: FDS2

-motor: 15 hp, 575 volt, 1765 rpm

-Maximum Rpm 3600

-Flow Rate up to 176gpm at 320psig with a 3500rpm motor - currently sized at 88gpm at the 1765rpm and easily 100gpm if you utilize a VFD.

-inlet & outlet: 3'' x 2.5'' tri-clamp

-316L stainless steel contact parts

- Stainless Steel solid Base with adjustable ball feet motor coupling and gaurd.


Utilized for a short start up period and then the process was shut down, these are in like new condition. $22,500.00 original Purchase Price

the motors are 575vac but can be run on a vfd without upgrading the motor to your required voltage.

message me if you would like to discuss sizing

The Fristam FDS is a positive displacement pump designed specifically for handling both viscous and low-viscosity fluids with ease. This highly sophisticated pump utilizes the advanced principles of double-screw technology, offering flexibility and reliability across a wide range of applications. Engineered for precision and optimized to the highest standards, the FDS pump delivers exceptional performance while maintaining hygienic standards, reducing wear, and improving efficiency.

items.title: Harvel PVC 1120 Duct / Pipe Section 71"L x 1/4" thick x 18" dia
items.category: Business & Industrial:Hydraulics, Pneumatics, Pumps & Plumbing:Pipe, Hose & Tubing:Pipe
items.description:
Harvel PVC 1120 Duct / Pipe Section 71"L x 1/4" thick x 18" dia

Harvel PVC Duct pipe is extruded from Harvel's own custom blend of dark-gray-colored Type I, Grade I, Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC) compound with a Cell Classification of 12454B per ASTM D1784 (PVC 1120). Harvel PVC Duct can safely carry a maximum service temperature of 140Â°F. Harvel PVC Duct is chemically resistant to most acids, bases, salts, aliphatic solutions, oxidants, and halogens. Unlike metallics, vapor phase or liquid-vapor phase corrosion is generally less aggressive with thermoplastics than the liquid phase corrosion.

Allen-Bradley Reactor, Line Input, Line Output, 3 to 5 % Impedance, 35 Amp, 0.8 mh, for 200 thru 690 Volt AC, 3-Phase

Allen-Bradley reactors help keep equipment running longer by absorbing many of the power line disturbances that can shut down your drive. Allen-Bradley isolation transformers can provide both voltage change and isolation for your variable speed drive. These designs are harmonic compensated and IGBT protected to help assure optimum performance in the presence of harmonics.

items.title: Goodway Whipper CM35 Continuous Mixer Oakes aerating product injection homogeniz
items.category: Business & Industrial:CNC, Metalworking & Manufacturing:Process Engineering Equipment:Other Process Engineering Equipment
items.description:
Goodway Model CM35, Sanitary cooled mixing chamber, stainless steel, continuous, Homogenize, high shear, rotary stator, aerator, mixer rated from 250 to 4800 pounds of product per hour â depending on materials and application. Continuous mixer, aerates hummus, cake batter, creme fillings, marshmallow, cream cheese, icings, whipped creme, butter and many others.

Used for over 500 applications worldwide, Goodway Continuous Mixers homogenize or aerate slurry to produce a highly uniform and stable cell structure. Mixers can combine two or more liquid streams, or just improve texture where aeration is not required. Energy-efficient and labor-saving, Oakes Mixers have a proven lifetime of forty years or more. Throughputs range from 10 to 14,000 lbs/hour.

Quality

The unique design of the high shear rotor/stator mixing head is the key to consistent final densities.  Mixers aerate or homogenize slurry with minimal heat rise.

Equipped with double wall mixing chamber for cooliant circulation with 16" OD / 13" ID pyramid shaped mixing teeth in Stainless head has raidial flow disc with high shear action consisting of front and rear rotor and stator with 2" sanitary fitting triclamp center finished product outlet port and sanitary seal drive shaft rated from 150psi standard up to 450psi on the CM35. Variable speed control and nitrogen flow Control panel has mixer / pump speed controls air suipply, head pressuree rergulator, and head presasure gauges a flow and hour meters. Mounted on a stainless steel common base frame.  230/460vac 3ph motor 
Removed from Working Cream cheese operating food plant.  The line was upgraded for increased capacity.  Good working and mechanical condition.  
Please check with your Freight Carrier for insured shipping. Payment by Wire Transfer, Paypal, MO, Co Check. Thank you for bidding.

 Local truck or Pickup from Albion NY.  We can load onto truck,  Please check with Freightquote.com for shipping quote.  60" x 60" x 104"H x 2500lbs for shipping from 14411   we can forklift load onto truck.    will help with shipping quote if you need it.   can ship same day service.

Please keep in mind if you have received a defective or damaged item, we are still happy to work with you to accept a return in a timely manner. Thank you for your consideration.

Please feel free to ask any questions before bidding. Buyer to arrange freight pickup at their expense. No returns on this item.

items.title: Southworth 2,000 LB Capacity Electric Pallet Tilter Jack, Model: PT42-85
items.category: Business & Industrial:Material Handling:Warehouse Loading & Unloading:Pallet Jacks & Trucks
items.description:
Southworth 2,000 LB Capacity Electric Pallet Tilter Jack, Model: PT42-85

E-Z Reach Portable Pallet Tilter â 2000 Lb Capacity â 34 In. W x 54 In. L

Flipping materials has never been easier with the aid of a portable container tilter. Can tilt products up to 85 degrees and comes with casters and a built-in charger.
Link to video below for how it works   https://youtu.be/BEZdbqov5Vg    

The E-Z Reach Portable Pallet Tilter is designed to simplify material handling tasks by allowing operators to tilt heavy pallets up to 85 degrees. With a 2,000 pounds capacity and compact dimensions of 34 inches wide by 54 inches long, this tilter machine improves access to goods while reducing strain and injury risk. This pallet tilter's portable design and built-in power system make it a practical solution for dynamic work environments.

Features & Benefits

Thanks to the capabilities of our tote tilters, much of the toll that lifting a pallet by hand can take on your workers becomes a thing of the past. We also make sure to bundle each of our tilting jacks with a set of casters and a built-in charger for its 12-volt DC power supply.

Its fork length of 40 inches and outer diameter of 24.5 inches provide stability during operation. As a heavy duty solution, it helps reduce manual lifting and improves workflow efficiency.



Applications

A box tilter can be of use in a variety of situations, including in the following industries:

  • Shipping centers and warehouses
  • Auto repair shops
  • Food processing facilities
  • Construction sites
  • Department stores and retail environments

This container tilter is ideal for industries that require frequent access to palletized goods. Whether used as a box tilter, tote tilter, or part of a tilt table system, it enhances safety and productivity. Its portability and ergonomic design make it a valuable addition to any facility focused on efficient material handling.

Selection Assistance

Choosing the right pallet tilter depends on your load requirements and workspace layout. Southworth Equipment offers expert guidance to help you select the best tilter machine for your operation. Reach out to our team for personalized support and ensure your equipment fits your workflow and safety goals.

Feel Free to reach out if you have questions,  we can load this onto a truck or trailer from our Facilities,  RS Automation in Albion NY 14411.   You can get a freight estimate from Freightquote.com if you need assistance, please feel free to reach out to Rick at RS Automation.

items.title: Anderson-Negele Sanitary RTD Probe, 10.5" insertion, for 41280 / SK10274 well
items.category: Business & Industrial:Test, Measurement & Inspection:Test Meters & Detectors:Thermometers & Temperature Measurement:Thermocouple Thermometers & Probes
items.description:
Anderson-Negele SA SA510631610000 style RTD probe pre-wired to CT CT13075F000100 display head:

Part No: SA510631610000
Wiring Style: (5) 6" leads for use with wiring head (see CT matrix)
Element Type: (1) 100 ohm Single (DIN stnd.)
Fitting: (063) Sanitary Projectile Well 41280 (equiv. Taylor SK10274)
Probe: (0) Standard (for well fittings)
Cable Type: (0) No Cable Required
Cable Length: (00) No Cable
Insertion Length: (161) 10-1/2"

Part No: CT13075F000100
Style: Standard
Module: 4-20 mA Analog Transmitter (head style 1 or 2 only)
Output Range: 0-200 (F only)
Engineering Units: Farenheit
Display Units: None
Prewired Element: None
Prewired Cable: None Supplied

Anderson SA-Series RTD sensors are 100 ohm, 3-wire, DIN standard elements designed for direct immersion in sanitary
applications or in any of a wide variety of thermowells. Sensors are available in single or dual element configurations.
Single element styles may be specified with factory sealed, shielded cables up to 200 feet in length, or in our unique
modular design or with our new water-tight quick disconnect. The modular elements can be mated with either the "mini"
head for stand-alone RTD applications or our transmitter head for analog or "SMART" transmitter applications. All dual
element sensors are supplied in the modular configuration, now available with dual output wiring heads as well.

All sensors feature completely sealed internals for maximum moisture and vibration resistance. They provide the fastest
possible response characteristics due to our unique method of internal element attachment which eliminates all air and
non-metallic materials between the element and the process material being monitored. These sensors are constructed
entirely of 316L grade stainless steel. 

RS Automation is located in Albion NY. We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities. Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.

items.description:
SLS 5000
High speed laser displacement sensors
High Frequency & Accuracy, Advanced Signal Filtering & Built for Hostile Environments
  • High speed PSD-based triangulation principle
  • Sophisticated fast automatic light control for varying surfaces
  • Designed for high accuracy measurements on difficult target materials; most flexible sensor available
  • Resolutions to 0.15 microns
  • Analog and digital outputs
  • Rugged industrial packaging
  • Internal processor for application software e.g. Seam Finding, Radial Runout, Texture Adjustment, Encoder Trigger Software
  • Ideal for general purpose applications

items.description:
WE ARE SELLING BRAND NEW HIGH QUALITY HAVECON GLASS VENLO DUTCH MANUFACTURED GREENHOUSE 300,000 SQFT OF HIGH END PREMIUM GRADE MANUFACTURED GREENHOUSE WITH  ADDITIONAL INSULATED METAL WALL PANELS FOR MANUFACTURING/WAREHOUSE SPACE INCLUDED.   ONLY $10/SQFT FOR BUILDING MATERIALS.  ERECTED COSTS ESTIMATED AT $2.50/SQFT

 OR OVER 8 ACRES IN SIZE. WE COULD ALSO SEPARATE INTO 50KSQFT KITS.  (PREFERRED ONE 300KSQFT SALE.)    
ALL OF THE MATERIAL WAS ORIGINALLY PURCHASED @ $20 MILLION IN MATERIALS ONLY FOR AN LEGALIZED INDOOR GREEN HOUSE FACILITY MEDICAL GROW FACILITY. DUTCH MADE GREENHOUSE THAT IS TOP OF THE LINE PREMIUM GREENHOUSE.  

We are selling Brand New HAVECON GLASS VENLO Dutch manufactured GREENHOUSE with 300,000 Sqft or over 7 acres in size. we We Could Also separate into 50Ksqft Kits. ( but would Preferred to sell all the materials in one Sale.) asking $3.5M for all 300Ksqft of the materials. All of the material were originally purchased @ $18Million in materials only for an Legalized Indoor green house Medical grow facility. This is DUTCH Made Greenhouse which is top of the line premium greenhouse. Links below showing assembly of a havecon greenhouse https://youtu.be/oMA6p_-CqpM https://youtu.be/PuY4unFylaI https://youtu.be/PuY4unFylaI
All of this material is located at RS Automation in Albion New York and ready for shipping and assembly. This greenhouse was purchased from a very large indoor grow project in Canada that The scope was reduced due to project investor funding. Your paying only 25 cents on the Dollar for this greenhouse along with all of the pre-engineered foundation and installation drawings. This Havecon Greenhouse package original purchase value was over $20.0 million without including the incoming shipping and import taxes and transportation and install. This is a great opportunity to save a huge amount of money along with the immediate inventory availability and all of the engineering technologies designed for indoor grow facilities. Asking $3.5M for entire 300Ksqft plus the additional materials and equipment included above description. This Green house would have a 10 times value erected and is a great value for offering. Currently these Green House Materials are on Backorder for over 18months. Approximately $500K to $700K per acre for installation costs depending on equipment required. This can be assembled BY HAVECON, Venlo Inc, DeCloet and other greenhouse installers or mechanical contractors within the USA or Canada. You can also use your mechanical General Contractor to install this premium Venlo Greenhouse. Here is a list of purchased materials from Havecon for the greenhouse & building materials also included with this project. 1. Additional $975K in value of 100Ksqft of Metal insulated sandwich wall panels 25â tall x R-11 for exterior walls, rooms, additional warehouse fabrication, outside security requirements. 2. Additional $950K in Value of 120Ksqft of insulated polycarbonate wall panels 21â tall provides complete light transmission between grow rooms for even light distribution and product isolation of strains. 3. Additional 75,000sqft of insulated metal roofing panels for creating a warehouse within the venlo roofing systems. $300K value. Allows you to Create hallways, and manufacturing areas within your greenhouse structures under the agricultural tax credits. 4. $950k in additional double ended sodium and LED grow lights, light/dark out curtain motors, automation controls, ect. 5. $500K in engineered building drawings for immediate submittals for your development project. 6. $2.07M in overseas shipping transportation to USA is included. 7. $1.7M in Sales Tax Savings. 8. $500K in import taxes that have already been paid. 9. $50k in Shipping storage Containers full of Hardware for this project implementation. Product Description: Havecon utilizes their proven dutch greenhouse technology with high end state of the art diffused glass that promotes the best light transmission at all angles of the sun along with their ventilation technologies for uniform temperature control and yields the highest levels of production.
Dutch HAVECON Glass Greenhouses are Favored by professional Commercial growers all over the world, the Venlo Greenhouse is the highest-quality, versatile greenhouse style that is designed with state-of-the-art technology. The Glass Venlo Style is able to withstand extreme weather conditions and provide the maximum amount of light transmission. Because the roof is composed of strengthened powder-coated Steel and aluminum components, the Venlo Greenhouse is rugged enough to withstand high wind and snow loads. The Traditional Venlo Greenhouse can be clad in glass, polycarbonate, film or a combination of all three, ensuring that growers can create optimal environmental conditions no matter the type of crops being grown or the region theyâre located. Dutch Engineered Premium Glass Venlo Greenhouse Advantage Includes: Strengthened aluminum roofing system for high light transmission. Increased vent to floor space ratio for superior ventilation. White Powder Coated steel Trusses for increased light transmission. Hot-dipped galvanized steel structural uprights/ Downspouts resists corrosion. Interior gutter distribution for maximum rainwater recovery. Corrugated Clear insulated wall panels for interior walls between rooms. Insulated Metal Wall Panels for meeting Security and insulation values for climate controls. Lowest operational cost per square foot. Customization for various sizes and designs. Fertigation Controls, Mechanical HVAC, Lighting Designs, Electricals, Full Engineered Solutions Available. Versatile cladding include glass, polycarbonate interior walls to create room for complete isolation for grow rooms segregation. Rugged, storm-safe design. Bay spacing 42â widths X 14âlong gutter sections that can be joined for desired length of rooms (We installed 42'x 250' sections x 20 rooms wide) 21â gutter heights. see actual pictures in this listing, Full Architect Engineered drawings for immediate installation and submission plans available Full automation and energy design packages available.
We can supply Full Turnkey Installation and Site design Support if required for your project. Hacp, SOP's, Security Cameras, Lighting, Hvac, Cogen, CO2, CFR121,Ect. We have full grow consulting services available if required. This is a Premium Glass Venlo Greenhouse that provides a high amount of light transmission and year-round climate control for any application.

Feel free to reach out with questions by email or contact us with your requirements at RS Automation LLC in Albion NY. We have over 1.0M sqft of this greenhouse installed here in Albion if you would like to visit and review this design for your application. The Cost per Sqft would be based on the required building design for your project. For example a Medical grow facility would be all concrete and a Vegetable or Strawberry Grow would be dirt Floors with Tarps. RS Automation is an engineering company that specializes in automation and process design if you need assistance in designing your project. Feel Free to reach us if you have any further questions. We can also offer full turnkey installations if needed or you can also utilize the manufacturer (Havecon, Decluette, or others) if desired. ALL of these materials (70+ tractor trailer loads) are on the ground wrapped as new and ready for installation here at our facilities in Albion NY and Ready for and immediate installation. Asking $3.5M for entire 300Ksqft plus the additional materials and equipment included above description. This Green house would have up to a 10 times value erected and is a great value for offering. Currently these Green House Materials are on Backorder for over 18months. Approximately $120K to $200K per acre for installation costs depending on equipment required. or $1.2M installation

Feel Free to message me for additional details. We can also do this project turnkey if you would require our services. Rick

items.title: GIG Cc28 Bvs 05 Atex G 001 X Transmitter
items.category: Business & Industrial:Industrial Automation & Motion Controls:Other Automation Equipment
items.description:
The CC28 uses catalytic combustion (CC) to detect combustible gases and vapours such as methane, propane and hydrogen. The long-life sensors make the CC28 an economical solution for detecting a wide range of combustible gases in the measurement ranges of 0 to 100% LEL and 0 to 4% by volume (NH3). Its automatic temperature compensation and the linearization of the measurement signals ensure high measurement accuracy.

Explosion protection, functional safety and device protection
The CC28 has ATEX certification for use in Ex Zone 1, and its hardware complies with the European Functional Safety Standard DIN EN 61508-2: 2011 (SIL). The housing is protected against ingress of dust and water (protection class: IP64). An optional weatherproof housing provides additional protection.

Communication and service
Signals are transmitted via the analog industry standard (4-20 mA). The CC28 uses two status LEDs to indicate its operating status. Service and adjustments are carried out on site using the optional RC2 remote control (one-man adjustment). The pre-adjusted sensors can be easily replaced thanks to Smart Sensor technology. Test gases for function tests can be inserted using a flow adapter

Key features at a glance:


General information:

  • Measurement method: Catalytic combustion (CC)
  • for combustible gases and vapors
  • short response time due to stack effect
  • expected sensor lifetime: 5 years
  • signal transmission: 4-20 mA
  • protection class: IP64

Approvals / Certifications:

  • ATEX certification: II 2G Ex demb [ib] IIC T4 Gb
  • SIL 2/3 (hardware)

Optionally available:

  • operating unit RC2, windshield, weatherproof housing, flow-through adapter

RS Automation is located in Albion NY. We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities. Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.

items.title: COGNEX In-Sight D900 High Resolution Vision System with Moritex Optics Package
items.category: Business & Industrial:Test, Measurement & Inspection:Cameras & Imaging:Other Cameras & Imaging
items.description:
Solve the most challenging vision applications with AI-based automation

The In-SightÂ® D900 vision system automates complex applications that are too difficult to deploy with traditional, rule-based machine vision and require reliable, fast, and consistent results not possible with human inspection. Embedded with a full suite of both edge learning and deep learning tools, In-Sight D900 solves a range of tasks from defect detection to assembly verification and optical character recognition (OCR). Processing takes place on-device, which eliminates the need for a PC, simplifying application deployment and bringing the power of artificial intelligence (AI) to non-programmers.

These cameras were used in a robotic packing test system. Equipped with Moritex ML-M1616UR Ultra High Resolution lens. They are in "like new" condition and work perfectly. 

This camera factory new sells for around $16,000

Please note: due to the value of these cameras an insured shipping option will be needed. Buyer can either set up shipping or we can work with you on a solution.

Contact us for further technical specs and data sheets (can also be found on Cognex website)

RS Automation in Albion NY.  We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities.

items.description:
Precision CellRad Benchtop machine, SN: 2328A50306, 

The Precision CellRad Benchtop operates at 130 kV with a maximum cabinet voltage of 130 kV. It features a rotating turntable inside a stainless steel chamber to ensure uniform dose distribution. The unit is equipped with a touchscreen interface for programming and control. Certification marks include CE and FDA clearances, confirming compliance with relevant safety and operational standards. The instrument was manufactured in January 2022 and has an input voltage rating of 208-240 V with a fuse rating of 25 A T10. The product is made in the USA. DESCRIPTION
Specifically designed for use in sanitary washdown production environments, particularly food and beverage manufacturing. Hoffman WaterShed Enclosures feature a sloped top, sloped door edges, bullet-style hinges and additional unique features that facilitate washdown runoff.

nVent HOFFMAN WATERSHEDâ¢ Enclosure, Series: WS1, 48 in Length, 36 in Width, 16 in Depth, NEMA 4X, Bullet Hinged/Lift-Off Cover, Lock: Quarter Turn Latch, Wall Mount, 304 Stainless Steel, Brushed

Depth : 16 in

Material : 304 Stainless Steel

items.title: WAUKESHA 3"x3" SPX 220/ 180 U2 POSITIVE DISPLACEMENT 10hp Ampco zp pump
items.category: Business & Industrial:Hydraulics, Pneumatics, Pumps & Plumbing:Pumps & Pump Accessories:Other Pumps
items.description:
Used Waukesha Cherry-Burrell SPX 180 U2 Positive Displacement Pump
DISPLACEMENT PER REVOLUTION:  0.380 Gal. (1.438 Liter)
NOMINAL CAPACITY TO:  230 GPM (52.2 mÂ³/hr.)
MAXIMUM PRESSURE: 450 PSI (31.0 bar)
3" triclamp fittings.   The Waukesha 180 pump is basically a 220 pump that has shorter impellers that allow it to operate at the 450psig pressures.   its a direct drop in for any 220 series pump.  

 CIP capability available. Pump body has optional internal flat body profile and will free drain with vertical ports
  • Optional rotor and body hub drilling provided for difficult CIP cleaning applications
  • Cover is free draining in horizontal or vertical port positions
  • Rotor/shaft connection sealed from product zone
  • Single mechanical seals standard. Optional double mechanical seals also available
  • Displacement per revolution: 0.380 a gallon
  • Nominal capacity: 230 grams per minuteQ
  • Max pressure: 450 PSI or 31.0 bar
  • Baldor motor: 10 horsepower
  • Electrical: 208-230/460 volts, 3phase, 60 hertz
  • Nord Gearbox  12.68 ratio 
  • pump will deliver 54gallons at 60hz and 108gallons at 120hz  
Long-life Features
Up to 500 psi (34.5 bar) pressure capability.
Special rotor nut designed for extended service without loosening.
No bearings in the product zone.
Large diameter 17-4 PH shafts for greater strength and stiffness.Helps reduce vibration; extends seal life.
Heavy duty bearing frame (stainless steel available as an option).
Double tapered roller bearings.
Greased lubed bearings for positive lubrication to all bearings over entire speed,temperature and pressure range.
Body retaining screws for maintaining mechanical seal contact during inspection.
Extended outer seal life. A wave spring, instead of an O-ring, mechanically loadsthe seal.
O-Ring on inner seal, seals on clean surface as seal moves due to wear.
Unique mechanical seal design utilizes 3 pin stationary seal and specialdesign shaft for rotary seal.

0-600 RPM speed range. 3" (76.2 mm) port sizes available; suitable to 450 PSI (31.0 bar) differential pressure. Temperature range -40Â°F (-40Â°C) to 300Â°F (149Â°C).

This pump is being sold in as-is inspected and running at our facility and we do not offer returns due to the size and cost of this unit.  

Please contact us regarding freight shipping estimate from Albion NY 14411

RS Automation in Albion NY.  We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities.

RS Automation is also an process equipment Distributor and can help you with sizing a gearbox, flow rates, viscosities, horsepower, controls and integration into a turnkey process system if you need assistance.  Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.  We can help with engineering if you need some additional help with controls and or equipment or even a complete process system.  

Feel Free to reach out to us if you have questions or equipment process needs, we'd be glad to help.

items.title: Honeywell Truline DR4500A 12" Chart Recorder - DR45AT-1100-00-001-0-100000-0
items.category: Business & Industrial:Test, Measurement & Inspection:Analyzers & Data Acquisition:Data Acquisition & Loggers:Recorders & Plotters
items.description:
The DR4500 is a 12â circular chart recorder aimed at applications in food processing, pharmaceuticals, heat treatment, environmental testing, manufactured goods and water/waste water treatment. It creates its own chart, thereby eliminating the need for an inventory of preprinted charts and providing flexibility to the user. It is RS-485 Modbus communications enabled and has an integral PID controller.â

The DR4500 circular chart recorder is a microprocessor-based recorder suitable to meet a wide range of industry requirements. It comes with a digital display and easy-to-use operator interface. The Truline pen provides a convenient method to document a process while minimizing maintenance hassles. An integral PID controller and RS-485 Modbus communications ensure user empowerment. This accurate and easily configurable recorder is designed to work in tough industrial situations.

Model # Truline DR45AT-1100-00-001-0-100000-0 (Updated from DR45AT-1100-00-000-0-2M0000-0)
Chan 1: T/C, RTD, mV, 0-5 VDC, 4-20 mA, Radimatic, 0 - 10 VDC
Chan 2: T/C, RTD, mV, 0-5 VDC, 4-20 mA, Radimatic
2 Alarms/2 Digital Inputs
Gray Door with Acrylic Window

RS Automation is located in Albion NY. We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities. Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.

items.description:
APS sanitary Tube in Tube Double Stainless Heat Exchanger APS 10 'x 2" triclamp  price is each 
we have three of these double tube sanitary heat exchangers , they were designed to heat product for cooling or heating including pasteurizing products utilizing steam or hot water and or glycol through the outside of the tubes and the product goes through the 2" triclamp internals.  these are called tube in tube heat exchangers or double tube heat exchangers.   
RS Automation in Albion NY.  We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities.   
RS Automation is also a pump Distributor and can help you with sizing a gearbox, flow rates, viscosities, horsepower and integration into a turnkey process system if you need assistance.   Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.  We can help with engineering if you need some additional help with controls and or equipment or even a complete process system.  

we are selling these tubes individually and will sell all three for $5000.  we've included pictures of the spx hot water pump, stand pipe, air eliminator and brazed plate heat exchanger.   my customer utilized steam on the brazed plate heat exchanger to heat hot water and the pump circulated the water through the outside of the tubes for heat transfer..

These can also be utilized for cooling product as well  

so to be clear,  this auction is for 1 tube and the other equipment is not included in this auction, however it is available for sale if you may need it.  

we can forklift load onto a truck for you with no problem

items.title: Omega CTXL-TRH-G Universal Circular Chart Recorder
items.category: Business & Industrial:Test, Measurement & Inspection:Analyzers & Data Acquisition:Data Acquisition & Loggers:Recorders & Plotters
items.description:
The CTXL-TRH-G from Omega is a grey colour temperature/relative humidity recorder with 2 built-in relays. It is designed for both local and remote monitoring of temperature and relative humidity. The standard sensor probe clips to the side of the unit or may be detached and mounted up to 12m (40') away, using available extension cables. The CTXL-TRH is available with specialty paper charts with optimal ranges marked right on the chart so user can easily see from a distance that the temperature and humidity readings are within range. A Windows-based application program allows the user to monitor the temperature and relative humidity using their PC. User can log the data to a file, as well as display the information on a custom on-screen chart, set the alarms on the recorder and display their status on-screen. Can also re-scale the recorder chart paper, setting temperature and %RH limits anywhere within the range of the unit.
  • Allows user to use 8" chart to display narrow temperature, humidity bands for greater resolution
  • Easy to read dual channel backlit LCD readout, monitors min/max/avg values
  • 0.5, 3.5, 16min chart response time for 1, 7 and 32 days recording
  • Temperature range from -17.7Â°C to 49Â°C with Â±1Â°C (display accuracy) and Â±1.5Â°C (chart accuracy)
  • Relative humidity range from 0 to 98% RH with Â±3% RH (display accuracy) and Â±4% RH (chart accuracy)
  • Convenient front panel programming/operation
  • High/low audible/visual alarms
  • Dual high alarm relays, dual low alarm voltage outputs
  • Double sided charts with magnetic mount hub, ABS enclosure
  • Benchtop or wall mount with built-in chart lights, powered by 4D batteries or universal AC adaptor


RS Automation is located in Albion NY. We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities. Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.

items.title: 2-Fanuc M-3iA/6S Delta Robots Automated Packaging line Pick and Place conveyor
items.category: Business & Industrial:Industrial Automation & Motion Controls:Industrial Robotic Arms
items.description:
2- Fanuc 3iA 6s High-speed pick and place 4-axis Delta (Spider) Robots with Wrist and Vacuum Head End Effector 

This automated pick and place packaging line was removed from a working production line and is ready to redeploy on any pick and place high speed line.   Link to Robot  Delta Robot - FANUC M-3iA/6S 4-Axis Delta Robot | FANUC America

The 3ia-6s is Fitted with Fanuc servomotors for high acceleration and short cycle times, this Delta Robot is ideal for high speed picking operations. Its four axes and high-speed single axis wrist provide increased dexterity, while its long reach makes it ideal for picking applications across multiple conveyors.

 This Listing is for one of two  Fanucs 3ia-6s delta robots with the Dorner Conveyor lines that run through this cell.   Will sell the entire line as a complete package.  

The Fanucs 3ia-6s robot is design and Rated IP-67 Washdown Rated Food/Cleanroom for both primary and secondary food/clean room applications.  This line was removed from a working packaging line that was running. 

FANUC's 3ia 6s 8 Kilogram lift capacity â 3ia-6s series of delta robots are specifically designed to maximize speed and versatility in picking and packing applications, especially in food handling and washdown environments Based on the classic parallel-link design, the 3ia-6s Series provides increased payload, inertia, and the longest reach of any FANUC delta robot (1350mm). But the details really make it shine: New design features make it easier than ever to program, clean and sanitize, while meeting even the most strict food safety regulations.

4-axis  with wrist delivering speeds of up to 4,000 degrees/second, this model is for high-speed picking and kitting applications.

 

These Spider Delta Arm robots were configured for high speed picking and placing packaged products into a cartons for high speed lines and labor reduction.   RS Automation has Multiple pick and place units at our R&D facility in Albion NY for demonstrations and proto-typing applications.  We purchase packing robotic cells for repurposing and re-engineering for automating packaging lines and reduction of labor intensive packaging lines.  one servo is showing a fault on the motor during a power up,  we haven't tested this unit further.     These units were valued at $450K each and work perfectly.   We also have a complete Allen Bradley Compact Logix Safety PLC and Rockwell Servo Drive components to integrate directly into your packaging/filling line. 

 We are Selling this automated packaging cell and will configure them for your product application if desired.  RS Automation is a full turnkey automation engineering machine build/packaging and process control company that is fully capable designing, modeling and building all aspects for automated assembly and packaging lines.  We custom build  the end effector for picking your product into the case orientation desired for your products.  Please feel free to reach out and talk with our engineering team regarding your needs, We'd be happy to help you and your manufacturing operation.   RS Automation is located In Albion NY 14411 

 

Link to Fanuc spider / delta robotic Packer on Youtube-    https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b_vf_etk5ME&ab_channel=RoboticPackagingMachinery

https://www.fanucamerica.com/products/robots/series/dr-3ib-series-delta-robots?wvideo=l1t5wmv0ir

  

Please Feel Free to Email us or reach out to us for further discussions at RS Automation in Albion NY.  

Buyer responsible for all freight costs. we will load on your truck from Albion NY 14411

items.description:
Loren Cook Contour 3hp Centrifugal exhaust Fan 4725 CFM 1.75 High Pressure

Cook ContourÂ® mixed flow wheel, fully welded, roof exhauster. Downblast, belt drive, curb mount with spun aluminum topcap. Used in a variety of commercial and industrial applications where the air is directed towards the roof. The QMXE has superior rain infiltration protection as compared to traditional upblast axial units.

FEATURES

  • Lifting lugs
  • Cast regreasable bearings
  • Spun aluminum discharge topcap
  • Welded construction
  • Four-bolt motor plate for positive belt  tensioning
  • Spark resistant construction available upon request
  • Direct drive available upon request
These Fan were $3950 each when purchased and are brand new on a pallet ready for  installation 

RSA Industrial Sales is proud to be a dedicated supplier to the manufacturing industry. We are a leading source for quality new and used equipment. We understand that keeping your equipment running is vital keeping your customers happy and we can provide equipment or replacement parts to get your machine or next project back on schedule. All of our items listed are in stock at our Albion NY warehouse and will ship your purchase within 1 business day, Expedited shipping available. We get hundreds of items in daily, if we donât have it today check back tomorrow.

 PAYMENTS

PayPal, Credit/Debit Card, Wire Transfer in USD, Company Check, or Personal Check. If the purchase is paid for with a check, the item will not ship until check clears.

For customers who want to claim tax-exempt, you will need to send a tax-exempt form to eBay. eBay collects all sales tax, we have no control. To send your tax-exempt form to eBay, copy and paste the following link in your browser: https://www.ebay.com/help/buying/paying-items/paying-tax-ebay-purchases?id=4771#section2


 DOMESTIC SHIPPING

  • The shipping price is shown for US lower 48 states.
  • Please enter your zip code (or country) and quantity in the shipping tab for an accurate shipping quote.
  • Need it urgently? Next Day & Second Day Air Services are available. Call us and we will do what we can to get it to you quickly.
  • We ship USPS, UPS & FedEx. We choose the carrier.
  • If you prefer, we can ship using your account. Please choose Local Pickup at checkout and included the following info: Account number, billing zip code, and shipping service requested (ground, next day air, second-day air...) Note that we CANNOT issue partial refunds for shipping that was paid!
  • Items paid for before 9:30 AM (EST) will usually ship out the same business day.
  • Large items that require an LTL shipment generally go out the next business day.
  • Larger items that must be shipped via flatbed truck will ship as soon as the truck can be secured, usually no more than 3-5 business days.
  • If an item needs to be shipped by freight courier, the buyer must contact us to request an invoice.

 FREIGHT ITEMS

Please DO NOT pay for freight items until freight charges have been added to the invoice. eBay will not automatically charge you freight. To get a freight quote, send us a message through eBay. To get a freight quote we will need to know the following:

  1. Will this be shipped to a commercial or residential address
  2. Will there be a dock or forklift
  3. Your full shipping address
  4. Your phone number and business name

If you would like to set up your own freight, we will palletize the business day after payment is received and send you weights and dimensions. The buyer will then be responsible for scheduling the pickup and sending us the BOL. Please make sure that we have the BOL BEFORE the truck gets here to pick up the freight. We do have a charge to palletize for LTL freight, please contact us with the item number or SKU number from the listing for a cost on palletizing.

LOCAL PICK-UP
Prefer to pick it up yourself? You are welcome to do so, by appointment. We will load it free of charge unless otherwise stated in the listing. If your purchase requires a pallet, banding or any other form of packaging, a packaging fee may apply.

 

 

 RETURNS

  • Customer satisfaction is our #1 priority!!
  • We have a 30-day return policy.
  • If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, please contact us to return your purchase within 30 days of receiving your item, and we will refund you for 100% of your purchase price (return policy excludes all manuals, and AS-IS items, see listing description). Alterations or removal of any components of a part voids the 30-day return policy.  All returns must include all original parts and manuals. Once we get the item, we will inspect the item to make sure it is in the same condition as we shipped it, and if it is, we will issue a refund. While we fully understand that it is sometimes necessary to return a product, we ask you to read the following instructions carefully to ensure your return goes smoothly and that you receive your replacement or refund in a timely manner with minimal hassle:
First let us know you need to return a product by contacting us with the product info, the transaction number and a short line on reason for the return (the reason is just for our info as we do not challenge returns within the return period).
Pay attention to the dates: You need to contact us before the end of the return period (day 1 is the day after you received your product from us). After the return period has ended, you can no longer return the product.
Do not ship right away: Wait for us to emit a Return Authorization and to confirm the return method.
Whenever possible and convenient to you, a returned item will be replaced by an identical item instead of issuing a refund, your choice.
We only emit Refunds/Exchange once the original product has been returned back to our store in the same condition it was shipped.
Please note that our warranty does not cover shipping charges to and from the customer.
If you have any questions in regards to returning an item, please contact us and be sure to include the item number and a concise description of the question or issue in your message.

FS Shear Blender 

The FS Shear Blender is used across a variety of hygienic applications, especially where high-quality, precision, speed and uniform mixing is needed. Common uses include:  Food & Beverage: Salad dressings, sauces, beverages, mayonnaise, etc. Cosmetics & Personal Care: Lotions, shampoos, creams, deodorants, toothpaste, mouthwash, perfumes, detergents, sanitizers and more Pharmaceuticals: Vaccines, inhalers, syrup suspensions Dairy: Chocolate milk, Greek yogurt, processed cheese, ice cream mix

How Does the FS Shear Blender Work?

The FS Shear Blender works by drawing product into the rotor-stator unit, where high-speed rotation creates intense shear forces. These forces disperse particles into the liquid, ensuring a fine, uniform blend.

Features:

  • Consistent Blending: The FS delivers superior, repeatable results with every batch, ensuring uniformity across large production runs.
  • Versatile Rotor-stator Configurations: Choose from a range of configurations, from coarse to fine, depending on your specific blending needs.
  • Compact and Efficient: The FS integrates seamlessly into existing production lines, especially in batch tank processes.
  • Hygienic Design: Built for easy cleaning and maintenance, with 3-A certification ensuring sanitary standards.
  • Low Maintenance: Designed for continuous duty and minimal maintenance, reducing downtime in production.

The Pump is new and is located at our facility at RS Automation in Albion NY.  We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities.   feel free to contact us for your requirements.

The Spirax Sarco PivotrolÂ® Pump (patented) is a non electric pump which transfers high temperature condensate, or other liquids from a low point, low pressure or vacuum space to an area of higher pressure or elevation. This self-contained unit including PowerPivotÂ® technology (patented) uses steam, compressed air or any other suitable pressurized gas as the pumping force. The standard PivotrolÂ® Pump (patented) will handle liquids from 0.9 to 1.0 specific gravity.

items.category: Business & Industrial:Hydraulics, Pneumatics, Pumps & Plumbing:Pumps & Pump Accessories:Centrifugal Pumps
items.description:
This Alfa Laval LKH20 Centrifugal Pump with Baldor 5hp 1750rpm 2.5"x2" clamp is a reliable and efficient solution for your pumping needs. The pump is designed for use in various industries such as manufacturing, construction, and mining. It features a centrifugal impeller that provides a high-quality flow and a clamp that ensures easy installation and maintenance. The pump is made by Alfa Laval, a trusted brand known for its superior performance and durability.

This pump package retails for around $6000 new.

See our eBay store for other pump offerings. RS Automation can also help size a pump specific to your application. 

This pump is skidded and ready for freight pick up. We can assist with a carrier if needed, or ship for additional fee.

RS Automation is also an process equipment Distributor and can help you with sizing a gearbox, flow rates, viscosities, horsepower, controls and integration into a turnkey process system if you need assistance.  Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.  We can help with engineering if you need some additional help with controls and or equipment or even a complete process system.

items.category: Business & Industrial:Industrial Automation & Motion Controls:Electric Motors:Pump Motors
items.description:
Item Description:

Burkert Type 8801 Angle Seat Control Valve - Complete w/ Control Top
- Type 2100 angle seat valve, stainless steel, 1" NPT, normally closed, PTFE seat seal, below seat flow (for liquids), CIP & SIP      capable, max 16 bar / 185C
- Type 8691 control top, AS-Interface, M12 connector, single-acting, G 1/8 threaded air

New in box. 

The design of the Type 8801 on/off system series ELEMENT enables the easy integration of automation units in all expansion stages: from electrical and optical position feedback to pneumatic control. The highly integrated system consisting of valve and automation unit is characterized by its compact and smooth design, integrated pilot air ducts, IP65/67/NEMA4X degree of protection and high chemical resistance.

FANUC SPIDER ROBOT M-1iA 0.5A 6-AXIS PICK & PACK W/ CELL R-30iA MATE & TEACH PENDANT INCLUDED

Incredibly versatile and nimble, this model achieves excellent work rates on complex component assembly operations. Capable of working at any angle, this is the perfect choice for applications (such as robotic assembly and pick and place) that demand flexibility and a high level of repeatability.

- 6 controlled axes
- 0.5kg payload (max up to1kg)
- 0.02mm repeatability
- 280mm reach

items.title: Ampco ZP-3 130 Positive displacement 15 30 45 60 220 pump Sanitary Waukesha 130
items.category: Business & Industrial:CNC, Metalworking & Manufacturing:Process Engineering Equipment:Other Process Engineering Equipment
items.description:
Brand New Ampco ZP3-130-Single Mechanical Seal Pump 304 SS / 316L SS 32 Ra Tri-Clamp 3â x 3â Bi-Wing Seal: 
   ZP3-130-SM     $18,264.00 List Price 
The ZP3 series is 15% more efficient pumping versus the Waukesha Universal series pumps,  This is also a front removable seal assembly which allows you to replace the seal assembly without removing the whole pump head.  

Ampco Pumps raise the bar with the introduction of the ZP3 Series of positive displacement pumps.  The patented font-loading seal design of the ZP3 offers a fully CIP-able pump without modifications or loss of efficiency.  The front loading design allows the seal to be easily maintained or changed and the newly designed rotor case eliminates all dead zones.

As with all ZP Series, the pumps include many standard features, including the stainless steel gear case.  All ZP Series Pumps are in conformance with 3A sanitary standards. 

Existing ZP2 and competing models can be upgraded to a ZP3 design with new rotors, seals and re-machining the existing rotor case in as little as 2 weeks.

Ampco is a Direct Drop-in replacement pump for all the Waukesha universal series.  

 We can supply any series pump you need. We stock every size from a 6 gallon per minute to a 220 gallon per minute pump.
Single Mechanical TC / SC CE / CA Viton 316 SS, Teflon Encapsulated O Ring,

Flow range from 10gpm to 100gpm for cip flow rates. 3.0â triclamp fittings, Shims,
palletized for shipment.

This is a Built to Order Pump with Stock at our Facility, We are a Stocking OEM  Pump Distributor
We can also Accept Waukesha pumps for trade in values up to 20% of the cost of new pump.  Some Restrictions apply.  Please call to discuss this in more details.
RSA can supply any flow rate requirements and Gearmotor speed ratio requirements.we can also supply you with all of the other sizes,
This is a Made to your requirements order.  
All Pumps and Gearmotors are in Stock.  006, 15, 18, 30, 45, 60 , 130, 220 AMPCO Pumps. 

We are a Ampco Pump OEM Supplier.  You wont find a better price on pumps anywhere.  please let us quote your next pump. 
  If you would like just a pump or parts only please email us to Ricks@rsautomation.net

if you have questions please feel free to call or email us with your requirements.  This Auction is for the Ampco Pump head only.  The picture with the Gearmotor is for showing the pump coupled to our Gearmotor integrated services.   
We are a full turnkey supplier for Sanitary and Chemical process equipment.

Please Check out our Website if you would like to understand more about our capabilities  @  RSAutomation.net 



You can Check out our Website at RSAutomation.NET


Also No false bidders, Do not bid if you don't intend to buy this unit.  We will accept Pay Pal, Money Order, or Bank Business check,  All checks must be cleared prior to pickup.  Payment due with in three days of sale.  If you back out of this sale and I don't have a bidder to remove this from my shop, I will leave feedback.  I am and Honest Ebayer.  

Please Feel Free to email me any Questions you may have.

items.title: Fristam FP1732-165 10hp 2" x 3" Clamp Centrifugal Pump
items.category: Business & Industrial:Hydraulics, Pneumatics, Pumps & Plumbing:Pumps & Pump Accessories:Centrifugal Pumps
items.description:
This Fristam FP1732-165 centrifugal pump is a reliable and efficient choice for your pumping needs. With a rated power of 10 hp and a size of 2" x 3", this pump is perfect for a variety of applications. The brand Fristam is known for its high-quality pumps and this one is no exception. Whether you're looking for a pump for industrial or commercial use, this Fristam pump is a great choice. Its clamp design ensures a secure fit and its durable construction will provide long-lasting performance. Invest in this pump for a reliable and efficient solution to your pumping needs.

See our eBay store for other pump offerings. RS Automation can also help size a pump specific to your application. 

This pump is skidded and ready for freight pick up. We can assist with a carrier if needed, or ship for additional fee.

RS Automation in Albion NY.  We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities.

RS Automation is also an process equipment Distributor and can help you with sizing a gearbox, flow rates, viscosities, horsepower, controls and integration into a turnkey process system if you need assistance.  Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.  We can help with engineering if you need some additional help with controls and or equipment or even a complete process system.  

Feel Free to reach out to us if you have questions or equipment process needs, we'd be glad to help.

Allen Bradley 1734-FPD

Field Power Distributor, 10 to 28.8 Volt DC, 120/240 Volt AC Operating Range
POINT I/O is a family of modular I/O products ideal for applications requiring flexibility and low cost of ownership. With one to eight channel density modules, including a self-configuring discrete module, the modularity of POINT I/O minimizes system costs and size. The ability to mix standard and safe I/O provides even greater flexibility and opportunities for standardization, regardless of application requirements. Since it can be used in local and remote I/O, POINT I/O further reduces engineering costs in design, installation and application development.

items.title: SQUARE D JLA361756 - 175A 3P current-limiting circuit breaker 600v 50/60Hz
items.category: Business & Industrial:Electrical Equipment & Supplies:Circuit Breakers & Disconnectors:Circuit Breakers
items.description:
PowerPacT J-Frame circuit breakers are designed to protect electrical systems from damage caused by overloads and short circuits. PowerPacT J-Frame circuit breakers are available with either thermal magnetic or MicroLogic electronic trip protection units. This PowerPacT J-Frame circuit breaker provides thermal magnetic circuit protection with a breaking capacity of 50kA at 600VAC. All PowerPacT J-Frame circuit breakers are equipped with dual-break rotating contacts that reduce the amount of peak current during a short circuit fault. All PowerPacT circuit breakers have an integral push-to-trip button in the cover to manually trip the circuit breaker. PowerPacT J circuit breakers are available in 2 and 3-pole unit mount and I-Line constructions. PowerPacT J I-Line circuit breakers are available in I-Line construction for easy installation and removal in I-Line applications. This unit has I-Line terminations on the line side and mechanical lugs on the load side. This PowerPacT J, 175A, 3 pole, circuit breaker has a breaking capacity of 50kA at 600VAC. This circuit breaker has a continuous current rating of 80% with a CBA phase connection. PowerPacT J circuit breakers comply to UL, CSA, NOM, and IEC standards and are CE marked.

RPM TL2+ Case Packer / Unpacker 
Allen Bradley  Servo Controlled with Compact Logix Safety PLC and HMI control.  
Extremely Flexible Pick and Place machine to control with uniform motion, high speed packaging, easily maintained and operated.
can pick and place up to 40 cycles per minute.  Currently configured for 6-8 ounce cups of product.  these are currently powered and operational in our facility and can be tested and run.   

This is a brand new unit that was confirgure for tub based products that can easily be configured for many applications like dips, yogurts, dry products, ect and placed into a carton for labor reduction.   We have three of these units that were purchased for and operation that never started.   These units were valued at $450K each and work perfectly.   over $47K in Allen Bradley PLC and Servo Drive components.   

We are Selling these for our customer and can configure them for your product application if desired.  RS Automation is a full turnkey automation engineering machine build/packaging and process control company that is fully capable of building  the end effector for picking your product in the case orientation desired for your products.  Please feel free to reach out and talk with us regarding your needs, we'd be happy to help you and your operation.   RS Automation In Albion NY 14411

production.  All the Hoppers, piston cylinders, Hepa Air Cabinet and change parts are Crated for shipping. 
The Replacement cost for this filler is over $900K and 50week leadtime 
The filler also comes with a tractor trailer load of food grade top seal barrier film if needed.  this is a $100K value. 

The filler is located at our facility at RS Automation in Albion NY.  We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities.   feel free to contact us for your requirements.  
we are selling this machine for a customer and can load this filler onto your truck.

POINT I/O is a family of modular I/O products ideal for applications requiring flexibility and low cost of ownership. With one to eight channel density modules, including a self-configuring discrete module, the modularity of POINT I/O minimizes system costs and size. Since it can be used in local and remote I/O, POINT I/O further reduces engineering costs in design, installation and application development.

probe can be cut to any length since it uses ultrasonic sound to read the length of the probe and dampening when it touches the product.

items.title: GEA Niro Soavi Homogenizer  NS3030P
items.category: Business & Industrial:Healthcare, Lab & Dental:Medical & Lab Equipment, Devices:Lab Mixers, Shakers & Stirrers:Homogenizers
items.description:
The GEA NS3030P is a high-pressure piston homogenizer from GEA's Ariete series, used in industries like food, dairy, and pharmaceuticals to reduce particle size and improve product stability. It is a reliable, state-of-the-art machine designed for continuous processing and is known for its high-quality construction with features like 3-A and electropolished versions, interchangeable valves, and aseptic options. 

Key features and applications

High-pressure homogenization:
The NS3030P uses a compression block and a homogenizing valve to pump products at high pressure, breaking down particles to nanometer or micrometer sizes. 

Versatile applications:
It is suitable for various sectors, including the dairy, beverage, food, pharmaceutical, chemical, and cosmetics industries. 

Advanced design:
The machine is built with durable, high-quality materials and offers flexibility with options for ball (PVB) and poppet valves (PVP)

This unit was $425K new from Gea and is brand new.  

No custom size pallet or complete crating is included with the item. We will load your truck at no cost using forklift loading during the pickup hours by appointment ONLY from 8:00 am to 3:30 pm, Monday thru Friday EST.  Contact us for assistance with finding a carrier.

We do not offer returns due to the size and cost of this unit.

RS Automation in Albion NY.  We are a full turnkey process engineering company for process design, controls and automation along with fabrication capabilities.
   
RS Automation is also a process equipment distributor and can help you with sizing a gearbox, flow rates, viscosities, horsepower, controls and integration into a turnkey process system if you need assistance. Please don't hesitate to ask for our help in your application.  We can help with engineering if you need some additional help with controls and or equipment or even a complete process system.  

Feel free to reach out to us if you have questions or equipment process needs, we'd be glad to help.

items.description:
RS Automation 300 Gallon Single Tank CIP Skidded System

Fully Refurbished and Reconditioned / new skidded system with many new parts,   New heat exchanger, AB controls and automation, piping, instrumentation 

This Clean In Place System was fabricated utilizing both new and some used components that was designed to be completely flexible for any application utilizing a Allen Bradley Compact Logix PLC and HMI for ease of use.  It Contains a 300 Gallon Stainless CIP Skidded System & Tank with Integrated Controls.  It comes documented complete with a full set of electrical and Process Drawings.   We can supply this with a full CIP sequencer and pinning chart for your operation.   Feel Free to reach out to us and discuss your plants needs. 

Dimensions : 48âW x 96âL x 100â tall
1- IFM Level Sensor  # pi2798
1-300 Gallon Slope Bottom tank with built in overflow and 18â top manway, 1.5â spray ball for Water Supply and system rinsing.                                                                                         1-Enerquip - Sanitary Steam Heat Exchanger  with a Burkert 2â Modulating Steam Control Valve and Steam stop Valve, 1.5â Sarco
1-15HP SPX Centrifugal Sanitary Pump  Rated 30-180GPM
2.5â Sanitary Process valves                                                                                             Includes a 2âTC sanitary recirculation valve for Caustic circulation with-in the 300 Gallon Stainless Process tank for mixing.  
1- Rosemount 8721 2.5â Sanitary Flow Meter with Digital transmitter #8732                              1- Rosemount 2.0â Sanitary model #3051 for cip supply pressure transmitter                        1- Rosemount Conductivity Sensor 2â triclamp in Supply Tank                                                   2- Pyromation 2â Triclamp Sanitary supply and return RTDâs                                                   1- IFM 2â TCSI6000 Return Flow Switch
Includes 2.5â TC Sanitary Stainless piping, Stainless Steel IN-Line sanitary strainler.                                                                                                     2-Â¾â TC ITT Teflon Diaphragm Valves for Chemical Injection for Caustic and Acid/Sanitizer Addition
4-Stainless Steel Threaded Leveler Adjustable Feet on Stainless Skid
1- Nema 4X Control Panel: Stainless slope top control panel with Allen Bradley Compact Logix 18ER PLC with point I/O,  Allen Bradley 15â Panelview Series 7.  1- Bank of 16 SMC Ethernet solenoids.
1- MCC Panel 460 Volt, 60A, 3 Ph, 1- AB 15hp 525 Variable Frequency Drive â Ethernet with 1kva 480/120vac transformer
Overall Dimensions: 74â Long x 34â Wide x 85â high

items.title: 2018 International 7600 Aluminum Dump Truck 6way 11' Plow Spreader 34K miles
items.category: eBay Motors:Other Vehicles & Trailers:Commercial Trucks:Dump Trucks
items.description:
2018 International 7600 Aluminum Dump Truck

6-way 11' Plow and Spreader with Factory Extended Warranty

Make  International

Model  7600

Body Style  Dump Truck with Plow and Spreader

VIN/SN  3HAGSSNT4JL099526

Odometer Numbers  34100 miles 

Hours  2086

REPLACEMENT Cost is $325K  Town Updated trucks to all Automatics.  

Loaded with Every Option imaginable.  Full Cameras, Tarp, Conveyor for doing Road Shoulders and shutes, all digital controls, Cruise Control, Radio, air Ride,  

Engine Make/Model  Navistar N13, 430HP, 12.0L -  Great on Fuel Management 

Fuel Type Diesel

Transmission Model  Fuller

Fully Heated Windshield 

Transmission Type  Manual

Dual Axle  Tandem-Axle Hedrickson Axles 

On-Spot Automatic Drop Down rear Tire Chains see pictures 

Tire Size/Type   315/85R22.5

Tire Condition   Good

Plow Size  6way Blade Quick-tach drive in 11' blade. 

Dump Box Size  Aluminum 14' with Poly Liner and camera  see pics 

Drivetrain  6x4

Ownership Documents  Clear Title

Mechanical Condition  Very Good

Mechanical Notes

Service records are available. Plus Comes with a transferable warranty of 2 yrs purchased on 5/1/24, see pictures for more information.

Plow and spreader works as it should.   Aluminum is perfect condition and the bed clean.

Interior Condition  Very Clean

Misc Info

Hydramax works with cameras, clean and well maintained.

VIN# 3HAGSSNT4JL099526

Feel Free to message me or reach out to discuss this truck in more detail.  Rick at RS Automation in Albion NY 14411  
Truck is currently in PA however will be in Albion New york shortly.
